t = 1

def f(a, x):
    if x == 0:
        return a
    if x < 0:
        x = -x
        p1 = a[:x]
        p2 = a[x:]
        fp = p1[::-1] + p2[::-1]
        return fp[::-1]
    p1 = a[:n - x]
    p2 = a[n - x:]
    fp = p1[::-1] + p2[::-1]
    return fp
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = sum(a)
    for _ in range(q):
        s = s * 2 % 1000000007
        print(s)
    t -= 1
